      • north_angle

        public double north_angle​(Point3D p)
        return the (planer angle of the vector between this --> p, in DEGREES, in a compass order: north 0, east 90, south 180, west 270.
        Parameters:
        p - is the end point of the vector (z value is ignored).
        Returns:
        angle in compass styye [0,360).

      • up_angle

        public double up_angle​(Point3D p)
        return the vertical angles in DEGREES of the vector this-->p

      • up_angle

        public double up_angle​(Point3D p,
                       double h)
        return the vertical angles in DEGREES of the vector this-->p,
        Parameters:
        h - : is the extra height of the point p (used by GISElement).
